Cover.name: Cover
Cover.description: When you're behind an obstacle that could block weapons, guard you against explosions, and make you harder to detect, you're behind cover. Standard cover gives you a +2 circumstance bonus to AC, to Reflex saves against area effects, and to Stealth checks to Hide, Sneak, or otherwise avoid detection. You can increase this to greater cover using the Take Cover basic action, increasing the circumstance bonus to +4. If cover is especially light, typically when it's provided by a creature, you have lesser cover, which grants a +1 circumstance bonus to AC. A creature with standard cover or greater cover can attempt to use Stealth to Hide, but lesser cover isn't sufficient.

Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Greater).name: Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Greater)
Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Greater).description: The plating grants the wearer of the armor the 20 Hit Points for 1 hour or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.

Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Lesser).name: Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Lesser)
Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Lesser).description: The plating grants the wearer of the armor the 5 Hit Points for 1 minute or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.

Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Major).name: Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Major)
Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Major).description: The plating grants the wearer of the armor the 30 Hit Points for 1 hour or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.

Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Moderate.name: Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Moderate)
Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Moderate.description: The plating grants the wearer of the armor the 10 Hit Points for 1 minutes or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.

Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (True).name: Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (True)
Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (True).description: The plating grants the wearer of the armor the 40 Hit Points for 1 hour or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.

Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Arcan.name: Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Arcana)
Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Arcan.description: Granted by activating @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.MO8J2IcBhiTnm9D8]{Aeon Stone (Orange Prism)} when the last spell you cast was an Arcane spell.

Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Natur.name: Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Nature)
Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Natur.description: Granted by activating @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.MO8J2IcBhiTnm9D8]{Aeon Stone (Orange Prism)} when the last spell you cast was a Primal spell.

Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Occul.name: Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Occultism)
Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Occul.description: Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.MO8J2IcBhiTnm9D8]{Aeon Stone (Orange Prism)} when the last spell you cast was an Occult spell.

Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Relig.name: Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Religion)
Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Relig.description: Granted by activating @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.MO8J2IcBhiTnm9D8]{Aeon Stone (Orange Prism)} when the last spell you cast was a Divine spell.

Effect: Arboreal's Revenge (Speed Penalt.name: Effect: Arboreal's Revenge (Speed Penalty)
Effect: Arboreal's Revenge (Speed Penalt.description: The targets take a -10-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds as roots rapidly sprout from their wounds, which lasts until they @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} (DC 20).

Effect: Aromatic Ammunition.name: Effect: Aromatic Ammunition
Effect: Aromatic Ammunition.description: The components of this ammunition emit a strong smell when combined during its activation. A creature hit by an activated aromatic ammunition gains a distinct odor for up to 1 hour or until the scent is washed off (requiring at least a gallon of water and 10 minutes of scrubbing). Any creatures within 30 feet smell the target, allowing even those with a weak sense of smell to detect its presence, and all creatures gain a +1 item bonus to Track the affected creature for as long as it has the odor. A creature that has imprecise or precise scent doubles the range at which they can detect the target using their scent compared to the normal range of their scent.

Effect: Barding of the Zephyr.name: Effect: Barding of the Zephyr
Effect: Barding of the Zephyr.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.eoI3M6FXtcPWeg7i]{Barding of the Zephyr}

Activate D Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You trace a finger along the wind motifs on the barding, granting your companion wearing the barding a fly Speed of 30 feet for 10 minutes. Even if the companion doesn't have the mount special ability, it can still Fly while being ridden.

Effect: Belt of the Five Kings (Allies).name: Effect: Belt of the Five Kings (Allies)
Effect: Belt of the Five Kings (Allies).description: Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.YCjVrQnHfOtpmjYW]{Belt of the Five Kings} when your ally activates it.

Effect: Belt of the Five Kings (Wearer).name: Effect: Belt of the Five Kings (Wearer)
Effect: Belt of the Five Kings (Wearer).description: Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.YCjVrQnHfOtpmjYW]{Belt of the Five Kings} if you are wearing it.

Effect: Blast Boots (Major).name: Effect: Blast Boots (Major)
Effect: Blast Boots (Major).description: For 1 minute, the major blast boots remain active, allowing you to clumsily fly through the air for the duration. You gain a 30-foot Fly speed for the duration, but any time you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly}, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Blaze.name: Effect: Blaze
Effect: Blaze.description: The creature gains a +1 item bonus to saves versus fire effects.

Effect: Brewer's Regret.name: Effect: Brewer's Regret
Effect: Brewer's Regret.description: For 1 hour after consumption, you gain a +2 item bonus to saves against death and negative effects.

Effect: Brewer's Regret (Greater).name: Effect: Brewer's Regret (Greater)
Effect: Brewer's Regret (Greater).description: For 1 hour after consumption, you gain a +3 item bonus to saves against death and negative effects.

Effect: Cape of the Open Sky.name: Effect: Cape of the Open Sky
Effect: Cape of the Open Sky.description: The cape becomes a pair of golden drake wings that grant you a fly Speed of 30 feet for 1 hour.

Effect: Clockwork Goggles (Greater).name: Effect: Clockwork Goggles (Greater)
Effect: Clockwork Goggles (Greater).description: You gain low-light vision and darkvision for 10 minutes.

Effect: Clockwork Goggles (Major).name: Effect: Clockwork Goggles (Major)
Effect: Clockwork Goggles (Major).description: You gain low-light vision, darkvision, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See Invisibility} for 10 minutes.

Effect: Containment Contraption.name: Effect: Containment Contraption
Effect: Containment Contraption.description: Your circumstance bonus to saving throws against inhaled toxins increases to +2, and you also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against olfactory effects

Effect: Crimson Fulcrum Lens.name: Effect: Crimson Fulcrum Lens
Effect: Crimson Fulcrum Lens.description: You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against fear effects and a +2 item bonus to your melee Strike damage (this increases to a +4 item bonus to damage if the melee Strike is a jaws attack).

Effect: Curse of Potent Poison.name: Effect: Curse of Potent Poison
Effect: Curse of Potent Poison.description:
This curse magically speeds poison through your body.

Effect You take a -1 status penalty to Fortitude saves and you gain weakness 3 to poison (if you already have weakness to poison, increase it by 3). The curse remains until removed by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OyFCwQuw8XRazsNr]{Remove Curse} or similar magic.

Effect: Deadweight Snare (Failure/Critic.name: Effect: Deadweight Snare (Failure/Critical Failure)
Effect: Deadweight Snare (Failure/Critic.description: The creature takes a -2 status penalty to attack rolls for 1 round or until it Escapes (DC 18).

Effect: Deadweight Snare (Success).name: Effect: Deadweight Snare (Success)
Effect: Deadweight Snare (Success).description: The creature takes a -1 status penalty to attack rolls for 1 round or until it Escapes (DC 18).

Effect: Demon Dust (Stage 1).name: Effect: Demon Dust (Stage 1)
Effect: Demon Dust (Stage 1).description: The creature gains a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks

Effect: Demon Dust (Stage 2).name: Effect: Demon Dust (Stage 2)
Effect: Demon Dust (Stage 2).description: The creature gains a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks

Effect: Disarm (Success).name: Effect: Disarm (Success)
Effect: Disarm (Success).description: The target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to attacks with the item or other checks requiring a firm grasp on the item.

Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Greater).name: Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Greater)
Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Greater).description: If you choose to Demoralize, you gain a +3 item bonus to the Intimidation check.

Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Major).name: Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Major)
Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Major).description: If you choose to Demoralize, you gain a +4 item bonus to the Intimidation check.

Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Moderate.name: Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Moderate)
Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Moderate.description: If you choose to Demoralize, you gain a +2 item bonus to the Intimidation check.

Effect: Dragonfly Potion.name: Effect: Dragonfly Potion
Effect: Dragonfly Potion.description: You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed. Additionally, you gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.DRtaqOHXTRtGRIUT]{Low-Light Vision} and a +2 item bonus to visual Perception checks, and you can't be flanked except by creatures higher level than you are (though lower‑level creatures can still help their higher‑level allies flank). These effects last for 1 minute.

Effect: Ebon Fulcrum Lens (2 Action).name: Effect: Ebon Fulcrum Lens (2 Action)
Effect: Ebon Fulcrum Lens (2 Action).description: For 1 minute and gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls, saving throws, and DCs.

Effect: Ebon Fulcrum Lens (Reaction).name: Effect: Ebon Fulcrum Lens (Reaction)
Effect: Ebon Fulcrum Lens (Reaction).description: For the first 24 hours after you rejuvenate, you gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls, saving throws, and DCs.

Effect: Emerald Fulcrum Lens (Saving Thr.name: Effect: Emerald Fulcrum Lens (Saving Throw)
Effect: Emerald Fulcrum Lens (Saving Thr.description: For 1 round you gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls, saving throws, and DCs.

Effect: Energized Cartridge (Acid).name: Effect: Energized Cartridge (Acid)
Effect: Energized Cartridge (Acid).description: For the next strike, the ammunition fired from the affixed weapon to transforms into acid, dealing acid damage instead of its usual damage as well as [[/r {1d6}[persistent,acid]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Acid Damage} on a critical hit.

Effect: Energized Cartridge (Cold).name: Effect: Energized Cartridge (Cold)
Effect: Energized Cartridge (Cold).description: For the next strike, the ammunition fired from the affixed weapon to transforms into ice, dealing cold damage instead of its usual damage as well as [[/r {1d6}[persistent,cold]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Cold Damage} on a critical hit.

Effect: Energized Cartridge (Electricity.name: Effect: Energized Cartridge (Electricity)
Effect: Energized Cartridge (Electricity.description: For the next strike, the ammunition fired from the affixed weapon to transforms into electricity, dealing electricity damage instead of its usual damage as well as [[/r {1d6}[persistent,electricity]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Electricity Damage} on a critical hit.

Effect: Energized Cartridge (Fire).name: Effect: Energized Cartridge (Fire)
Effect: Energized Cartridge (Fire).description: For the next strike, the ammunition fired from the affixed weapon to transforms into fire, dealing fire damage instead of its usual damage as well as [[/r {1d6}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} on a critical hit.

Effect: Energizing Rune (Acid).name: Effect: Energizing Rune (Acid)
Effect: Energizing Rune (Acid).description: The weapon becomes imbued with the triggering energy type. It deals an additional 1d8 acid damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Energizing Rune (Cold).name: Effect: Energizing Rune (Cold)
Effect: Energizing Rune (Cold).description: The weapon becomes imbued with the triggering energy type. It deals an additional 1d8 cold damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Energizing Rune (Electricity).name: Effect: Energizing Rune (Electricity)
Effect: Energizing Rune (Electricity).description: The weapon becomes imbued with the triggering energy type. It deals an additional 1d8 electricity damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Energizing Rune (Fire).name: Effect: Energizing Rune (Fire)
Effect: Energizing Rune (Fire).description: The weapon becomes imbued with the triggering energy type. It deals an additional 1d8 fire damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Energizing Rune (Sonic).name: Effect: Energizing Rune (Sonic)
Effect: Energizing Rune (Sonic).description: The weapon becomes imbued with the triggering energy type. It deals an additional 1d8 sonic damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Energy Mutagen (Greater).name: Effect: Energy Mutagen (Greater)
Effect: Energy Mutagen (Greater).description:
Benefit You gain resistance 15 to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1d6 damage of the attuned energy type.

Drawback You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

Effect: Energy Mutagen (Lesser).name: Effect: Energy Mutagen (Lesser)
Effect: Energy Mutagen (Lesser).description:
Benefit You gain resistance 10 to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1 damage of the attuned energy type.

Drawback You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

Effect: Energy Mutagen (Major).name: Effect: Energy Mutagen (Major)
Effect: Energy Mutagen (Major).description:
Benefit You gain resistance 10 to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1d4 damage of the attuned energy type.

Drawback You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

Effect: Energy Mutagen (Moderate).name: Effect: Energy Mutagen (Moderate)
Effect: Energy Mutagen (Moderate).description:
Benefit You gain resistance 10 to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1d4 damage of the attuned energy type.

Drawback You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

Effect: Energy Robe of Electricity.name: Effect: Energy Robe of Electricity
Effect: Energy Robe of Electricity.description: You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed for 1 minute. (Defaults to 25)

Effect: Energy Robe of Fire.name: Effect: Energy Robe of Fire
Effect: Energy Robe of Fire.description: You gain a +30-foot status bonus to Speed for 1 minute.

Effect: Enhanced Hearing Aids.name: Effect: Enhanced Hearing Aids
Effect: Enhanced Hearing Aids.description: You mentally increase the input of your hearing aids. You gain a +1 item bonus to all hearing-based Perception checks for 10 minutes.

Effect: Euryale (Curse) Card.name: Effect: Euryale (Curse) Card
Effect: Euryale (Curse) Card.description: Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.gmg-srd.jVh90bfsC6w6iVyy]{Euryale (curse)} from the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Gyi4IVrAVJRPJF2s]{Deck of Many Things}

Effect: Exsanguinating Ammunition.name: Effect: Exsanguinating Ammunition
Effect: Exsanguinating Ammunition.description: For 1 minute after you deal damage to a creature with an activated exsanguinating ammunition that creature gains weakness 1 to persistent bleed damage. In addition, the DC of any flat checks to end persistent bleed damage increases from 15 to 17 (from 10 to 12 when receiving particularly effective assistance) for the duration.

Effect: Exsanguinating Ammunition (Great.name: Effect: Exsanguinating Ammunition (Greater)
Effect: Exsanguinating Ammunition (Great.description: For 1 minute after you deal damage to a creature with an activated exsanguinating ammunition that creature gains weakness 3 to persistent bleed damage. In addition, the DC of any flat checks to end persistent bleed damage increases from 15 to 17 (from 10 to 12 when receiving particularly effective assistance) for the duration.

Effect: Exsanguinating Ammunition (Major.name: Effect: Exsanguinating Ammunition (Major)
Effect: Exsanguinating Ammunition (Major.description: For 1 minute after you deal damage to a creature with an activated exsanguinating ammunition that creature gains weakness 5 to persistent bleed damage. In addition, the DC of any flat checks to end persistent bleed damage increases from 15 to 17 (from 10 to 12 when receiving particularly effective assistance) for the duration.

Effect: Eye of the Unseen.name: Effect: Eye of the Unseen
Effect: Eye of the Unseen.description: While wearing the eye, you gain a +1 item bonus to visual Perception checks.

Effect: Eye of the Unseen (Greater).name: Effect: Eye of the Unseen (Greater)
Effect: Eye of the Unseen (Greater).description: While wearing the eye, you gain a +2 item bonus to visual Perception checks.

Effect: Fire and Iceberg.name: Effect: Fire and Iceberg
Effect: Fire and Iceberg.description: You gain resistance 5 to fire and cold for 1 minute.

Effect: Fire and Iceberg (Greater).name: Effect: Fire and Iceberg (Greater)
Effect: Fire and Iceberg (Greater).description: You gain resistance 10 to fire and cold for 5 minutes.

Effect: Fire and Iceberg (Major).name: Effect: Fire and Iceberg (Major)
Effect: Fire and Iceberg (Major).description: You gain resistance 15 to fire and cold for 10 minutes.

Effect: Five-Feather Wreath.name: Effect: Five-Feather Wreath
Effect: Five-Feather Wreath.description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks and resistance 2 to falling damage.

Effect: Flask of Fellowship.name: Effect: Flask of Fellowship
Effect: Flask of Fellowship.description: You gain a +1 item bonus on your Diplomacy check.

Effect: Frost Vial (Greater).name: Effect: Frost Vial (Greater)
Effect: Frost Vial (Greater).description: The creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn.

Effect: Frost Vial (Lesser).name: Effect: Frost Vial (Lesser)
Effect: Frost Vial (Lesser).description: The creature takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn.

Effect: Frost Vial (Major).name: Effect: Frost Vial (Major)
Effect: Frost Vial (Major).description: The creature takes a -15-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn.

Effect: Frost Vial (Moderate).name: Effect: Frost Vial (Moderate)
Effect: Frost Vial (Moderate).description: The creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn.

Effect: Glittering Snare (Critical Failu.name: Effect: Glittering Snare (Critical Failure)
Effect: Glittering Snare (Critical Failu.description: The creature takes a -4 status penalty to Stealth checks for 5 minutes or until it spends a 3-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to remove the glitter. The glitter continues to fall around the creature until completely removed, leaving a trail behind it as it moves and revealing its rough location; the creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, rather than @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, to any creature that can see the glitter whenever it would otherwise have been undetected.

Effect: Glittering Snare (Failure).name: Effect: Glittering Snare (Failure)
Effect: Glittering Snare (Failure).description: The creature takes a -2 status penalty to Stealth checks for 2 minutes or until it spends a 2-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to remove the glitter. If the creature was @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, the glitter outlines it for 1 round, making it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} rather than @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to visual senses.

Effect: Glittering Snare (Success).name: Effect: Glittering Snare (Success)
Effect: Glittering Snare (Success).description: The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Stealth checks for 1 minute or until it uses an Interact action to remove the glitter.

Effect: Goggles of Night.name: Effect: Goggles of Night
Effect: Goggles of Night.description:
Granted by activating @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.K7VHhUamFz3kTnm5]{Goggles of Night}

You gain Darkvision for 1 hour.

Effect: Goggles of Night (Greater).name: Effect: Goggles of Night (Greater)
Effect: Goggles of Night (Greater).description:
Granted by activating @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Tej30MsQo8Ek9aA6]{Goggles of Night (Greater)}

You gain Darkvision until you rotate the lenses back or the item is no longer invested by you, whichever comes first.

Effect: Goggles of Night (Major).name: Effect: Goggles of Night (Major)
Effect: Goggles of Night (Major).description:
Granted by activating @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.rXXNw6dwVn96giDi]{Goggles of Night (Major)}

You gain greater darkvision, which lasts until you rotate the lenses back or the item is no longer invested by you, whicever comes first.

Effect: Greater Codex of Unimpeded Sight.name: Effect: Greater Codex of Unimpeded Sight
Effect: Greater Codex of Unimpeded Sight.description: You gain a +1 item bonus on your Perception check to Seek or skill check to Recall Knowledge.

Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form.name: Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form
Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form.description:
You transform into a Small or Medium animal that wields the fanged weapon in its jaws; the animal matches the animal you are most closely associated with (a lizardfolk would turn into a lizard, a kitsune into a fox, a deer instinct barbarian into a deer, etc.) or a wolf if no specific animal is applicable. While in this form, you can attack with the fanged weapon even though you don't have any hands. However, you can attack only with the fanged weapon and you don't have hands or the ability to hold items. For effects dependent on how many hands you are using to hold the item, such as the two-hand trait, you are holding the weapon in two hands. You can Dismiss this effect, and it ends automatically if you drop the fanged weapon (whether or not of your own volition).

In animal form, you gain low-light vision and a +5-foot item bonus to your Speed.

Effect: Greater Five-Feather Wreath.name: Effect: Greater Five-Feather Wreath
Effect: Greater Five-Feather Wreath.description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks and resistance 5 to falling damage.

Effect: Greater Potion of Stable Form.name: Effect: Greater Potion of Stable Form
Effect: Greater Potion of Stable Form.description: For the next hour, you gain a +3 item bonus against transmutation effects, which is +4 against polymorph effects. If you roll a success against a polymorph effect during that time, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Grit (Stage 1).name: Effect: Grit (Stage 1)
Effect: Grit (Stage 1).description: The creature gains a +1 item bonus to Athletics, Crafting, and Performance checks.

Effect: Grit (Stage 2).name: Effect: Grit (Stage 2)
Effect: Grit (Stage 2).description: The creature gains a +1 item bonus to Athletics, Crafting, and Performance checks, -2 item penalty to Perception checks.

Effect: Grit (Stage 3).name: Effect: Grit (Stage 3)
Effect: Grit (Stage 3).description: The creature takes a -4 item penalty to Perception checks.

Effect: Holy Steam Ball.name: Effect: Holy Steam Ball
Effect: Holy Steam Ball.description: Each use of the holy steam ball lasts for 1 hour and gives you a +2 item bonus to Will saving throws against possession effects from fiends and undead and effects from fiends and undead that cause the controlled condition.

Effect: Hyldarf's Fang.name: Effect: Hyldarf's Fang
Effect: Hyldarf's Fang.description: You call upon Hyldarf's power to gain the magic of a linnorm for a brief time. For 1 minute, you gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{True Seeing} as well as fire resistance 20.

Effect: Immolation Clan Pistol.name: Effect: Immolation Clan Pistol
Effect: Immolation Clan Pistol.description: For 1 minute, you look like a flaming corpse. During this time, you gain a +2 status bonus to Intimidation checks and the immolation hand cannon becomes a +2 striking flaming hand cannon.

Effect: Impossible Cake.name: Effect: Impossible Cake
Effect: Impossible Cake.description: For 10 minutes after the meal, you gain a +2 item bonus to your Deception checks to Impersonate, as well as to Lie to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.

Effect: Impossible Cake (Greater).name: Effect: Impossible Cake (Greater)
Effect: Impossible Cake (Greater).description: For 30 minutes after the meal, you gain a +3 item bonus to your Deception checks to Impersonate, as well as to Lie to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.

Effect: Impossible Cake (Major).name: Effect: Impossible Cake (Major)
Effect: Impossible Cake (Major).description: For 1 hour after the meal, you gain a +4 item bonus to your Deception checks to Impersonate, as well as to Lie to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.

Effect: Improvised Weapon.name: Effect: Improvised Weapon
Effect: Improvised Weapon.description:
Automatically applied effects:

  • -2 penalty to attack rolls with any weapon with an improvised trait.

Effect: Ivory Baton.name: Effect: Ivory Baton
Effect: Ivory Baton.description: The construct gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws (except saving throws against the ivory baton).

Effect: Jack's Tattered Cape.name: Effect: Jack's Tattered Cape
Effect: Jack's Tattered Cape.description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}.

Effect: Kraken's Guard.name: Effect: Kraken's Guard
Effect: Kraken's Guard.description: When you use the shield to Grapple, you gain a +3 item bonus to your Athletics check.

Effect: Major Fanged Rune Animal Form.name: Effect: Major Fanged Rune Animal Form
Effect: Major Fanged Rune Animal Form.description:
You transform into a Small or Medium animal that wields the fanged weapon in its jaws; the animal matches the animal you are most closely associated with (a lizardfolk would turn into a lizard, a kitsune into a fox, a deer instinct barbarian into a deer, etc.) or a wolf if no specific animal is applicable. While in this form, you can attack with the fanged weapon even though you don't have any hands. However, you can attack only with the fanged weapon and you don't have hands or the ability to hold items. For effects dependent on how many hands you are using to hold the item, such as the two-hand trait, you are holding the weapon in two hands. You can Dismiss this effect, and it ends automatically if you drop the fanged weapon (whether or not of your own volition).

In animal form, you gain low-light vision, imprecise scent to a range of 30 feet, and a +10-foot item bonus to your Speed.

Effect: Major Five-Feather Wreath.name: Effect: Major Five-Feather Wreath
Effect: Major Five-Feather Wreath.description: You gain a +2 item bonus to Acrobatics checks and resistance 10 to falling damage.

Effect: Malleable Mixture (Greater).name: Effect: Malleable Mixture (Greater)
Effect: Malleable Mixture (Greater).description: You gain a +3 item bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to Grapple, Shove, or Trip you for 10 minutes.

Effect: Malleable Mixture (Lesser).name: Effect: Malleable Mixture (Lesser)
Effect: Malleable Mixture (Lesser).description: You gain a +2 item bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to Grapple, Shove, or Trip you for 1 minute.

Effect: Metuak's Pendant.name: Effect: Metuak's Pendant
Effect: Metuak's Pendant.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to saving throws against mental effects that would make them confused, controlled, frightened, or stupefied.

Effect: Mudrock Snare (Failure).name: Effect: Mudrock Snare (Failure)
Effect: Mudrock Snare (Failure).description: The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed for 1 minute or until it Escapes (DC 27).

Effect: Mudrock Snare (Success).name: Effect: Mudrock Snare (Success)
Effect: Mudrock Snare (Success).description: The creature takes a -5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed for 1 minute or until it Escapes (DC 27).

Effect: Nosoi Charm (Diplomacy).name: Effect: Nosoi Charm (Diplomacy)
Effect: Nosoi Charm (Diplomacy).description: You gain a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to make a request.

Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Diplomacy.name: Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Diplomacy)
Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Diplomacy.description: You gain a +3 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to make a request.

Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Lifesense.name: Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Lifesense)
Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Lifesense.description: You gain lifesense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet as long as you are holding the charm, and do not need to activate it. This allows you to sense the life force that animates living creatures and the perverse force that animates the dead, though you can't distinguish between the two.

Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Performan.name: Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Performance)
Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Performan.description: You gain a +3 item bonus to Performance checks to play an instrument, orate, or sing.

Effect: Nosoi Charm (Lifesense).name: Effect: Nosoi Charm (Lifesense)
Effect: Nosoi Charm (Lifesense).description: You gain lifesense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet for 1 hour as long as you continue to hold the charm. This allows you to sense the life force that animates living creatures and the perverse force that animates the dead, though you can't distinguish between the two.

Effect: Nosoi Charm (Performance).name: Effect: Nosoi Charm (Performance)
Effect: Nosoi Charm (Performance).description: You gain a +2 item bonus to Performance checks to play an instrument, orate, or sing.

Effect: Oath of the Devoted.name: Effect: Oath of the Devoted
Effect: Oath of the Devoted.description:
Activate 1 command

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain a +1 status bonus to Will saves. Choose a weapon or an unarmed Strike; your chosen attack deals an extra [[/r {1d6}[fire]]]{1d6 fire damage} for the next 1 minute.

Effect: Ochre Fulcrum Lens.name: Effect: Ochre Fulcrum Lens
Effect: Ochre Fulcrum Lens.description:
You gain resistance 10 to mental damage and a +2 status bonus to saves against emotion effects.

  • Resistance to mental damage not implemented

Effect: Parry.name: Effect: Parry
Effect: Parry.description: You position your weapon defensively, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Potency Crystal.name: Effect: Potency Crystal
Effect: Potency Crystal.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ZCsksGf6NPUKz2Uw]{Potency Crystal}

The weapon becomes a +1 striking weapon for the rest of the turn, gaining a +1 item bonus to the attack roll and increasing the damage on a hit to two weapon damage dice.

Effect: Potion of Stable Form.name: Effect: Potion of Stable Form
Effect: Potion of Stable Form.description: For the next hour, you gain a +2 item bonus against transmutation effects, which is +3 against polymorph effects. If you roll a success against a polymorph effect during that time, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit.name: Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit
Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit.description:
This lightweight mesh fits easily over light armor. The suit is designed to incorporate local flora and ground clutter into the mesh to help you blend in seamlessly with the environment. Due to the abrasive nature of the materials used, this item is unsuitable for use by unarmored characters. You can prepare the suit for use within your current environment by using an exploration activity that takes at least 10 minutes, but sometimes longer if the materials are hard to find or the environment is unusual enough to warrant additional difficulty in preparing camouflage that can blend with it consistently.

A suit prepared in this manner grants you a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks while you attempt to Hide or Sneak in the specific environment it has been prepared for. The suit remains usable in this manner until you rest for the night, though it doesn't grant the benefit whenever you aren't in the appropriate environment. The GM might rule that some environments are unusual enough that you can't create a camouflage suit appropriate for the environment.

Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb.name: Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb)
Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb.description:
This lightweight mesh fits easily over light armor. The suit is designed to incorporate local flora and ground clutter into the mesh to help you blend in seamlessly with the environment. Due to the abrasive nature of the materials used, this item is unsuitable for use by unarmored characters. You can prepare the suit for use within your current environment by using an exploration activity that takes at least 10 minutes, but sometimes longer if the materials are hard to find or the environment is unusual enough to warrant additional difficulty in preparing camouflage that can blend with it consistently.

A superb camouflage suit is fashioned from especially well-blended materials grants you a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks while you attempt to Hide or Sneak in the specific environment it has been prepared for. The suit remains usable in this manner until you rest for the night, though it doesn't grant the benefit whenever you aren't in the appropriate environment. The GM might rule that some environments are unusual enough that you can't create a camouflage suit appropriate for the environment.

Effect: Private Workshop (Using for Craf.name: Effect: Private Workshop (Using for Crafting)
Effect: Private Workshop (Using for Craf.description: The workshop is stocked with mundane tools and can be used to Craft items appropriate to the workshop with a +1 item bonus, but you must supply any raw materials.

Effect: Protective Barrier.name: Effect: Protective Barrier
Effect: Protective Barrier.description:
Granted by Vontho's Golden Bridge

While the swirling rings of the vehicle don't fully cover the pilot, they offer incredible protection, magically maintaining the temperature within and ablating physical attacks. The pilot is protected from severe cold, severe heat, extreme cold, and extreme heat. The pilot also gains resistance 10 to all physical damage (except adamantine).

Effect: Qat (Stage 1).name: Effect: Qat (Stage 1)
Effect: Qat (Stage 1).description: The creature gains a +1 item bonus to Reflex saves.

Effect: Raise a Shield.name: Effect: Raise a Shield
Effect: Raise a Shield.description: You position your shield to protect yourself. When you have Raised a Shield, you gain its listed circumstance bonus to AC. Your shield remains raised until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Greater).name: Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Greater)
Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Greater).description: After Activating the mask, you also gain a +3 item bonus to Fortitude saves against inhaled effects; this bonus is increased to +4 against the deadly volcanic gas known around Terwa Lake as Dead Man's Breath, and possibly against other similar volcanic gases at the GM's discretion.

Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Lesser).name: Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Lesser)
Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Lesser).description: After Activating the mask, you also gain a +1 item bonus to Fortitude saves against inhaled effects; this bonus is increased to +2 against the deadly volcanic gas known around Terwa Lake as Dead Man's Breath, and possibly against other similar volcanic gases at the GM's discretion.

Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Moderate).name: Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Moderate)
Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Moderate).description: After Activating the mask, you also gain a +2 item bonus to Fortitude saves against inhaled effects; this bonus is increased to +3 against the deadly volcanic gas known around Terwa Lake as Dead Man's Breath, and possibly against other similar volcanic gases at the GM's discretion.

Effect: Rhino Shot.name: Effect: Rhino Shot
Effect: Rhino Shot.description: On a successful Strike, the attack deals an additional 2d6 force damage, and the target must succeed at a DC 19 Fortitude save or be knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. If the hit with the rhino shot was a critical success, the target is knocked prone unless it critically succeeds at its save.

Effect: Rowan Rifle (Cold).name: Effect: Rowan Rifle (Cold)
Effect: Rowan Rifle (Cold).description: The Rowan Rifle's damage type changes from its current damage type to cold. On the next sunrise, the Rowan Rifle returns to dealing fire damage.

Effect: Rowan Rifle (Electricity).name: Effect: Rowan Rifle (Electricity)
Effect: Rowan Rifle (Electricity).description: The Rowan Rifle's damage type changes from its current damage type to electricity. On the next sunrise, the Rowan Rifle returns to dealing fire damage.

Effect: Rowan Rifle (Sonic).name: Effect: Rowan Rifle (Sonic)
Effect: Rowan Rifle (Sonic).description: The Rowan Rifle's damage type changes from its current damage type to sonic. On the next sunrise, the Rowan Rifle returns to dealing fire damage.

Effect: Sarkorian God-Caller Garb.name: Effect: Sarkorian God-Caller Garb
Effect: Sarkorian God-Caller Garb.description: As long as it is within 30 feet of you, the summoned creature gains a +1 status bonus to AC. If it ever moves farther than 30 feet from you, the sigil fades and the creature loses the status bonus to AC, even if it later comes within 30 feet of you again.

Effect: Server's Stew.name: Effect: Server's Stew
Effect: Server's Stew.description: You are granted a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks made in the language granted by Server's Stew for 1 hour.

Effect: Shield of the Unified Legion.name: Effect: Shield of the Unified Legion
Effect: Shield of the Unified Legion.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.PlYr5AhYwHIztMw2]{Shield of the Unified Legion}

Auomatically applied effects:

  • gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC so long as you are within 30 feet of the shield's wielder and they have the shield raised

Effect: Shrine Inarizushi.name: Effect: Shrine Inarizushi
Effect: Shrine Inarizushi.description: Whenever you are in exploration mode, roll a separate Search activity check with a +1 status bonus; this does not affect your Speed. If the check succeeds, a fox appears to inform you of this discovery as best as it can, although it cannot speak.

Effect: Silkspinner's Shield (Animated S.name: Effect: Silkspinner's Shield (Animated Strike)
Effect: Silkspinner's Shield (Animated S.description: The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Silkspinner's Shield (Climb).name: Effect: Silkspinner's Shield (Climb)
Effect: Silkspinner's Shield (Climb).description: You animate the silkspinner's shield. Eight spider legs sprout from the shield's rim, granting you a climb Speed of 25 feet until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Skyrider Sword.name: Effect: Skyrider Sword
Effect: Skyrider Sword.description: You leap upon your sword as it soars through the air for up to 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed of 25 feet or your land Speed, whichever is slower, but you can't Strike with your weapon except via the weapon's other activation. You can Dismiss the activation, and it ends automatically if you cease holding the weapon with at least one hand.

Effect: Skyrider Sword (Greater).name: Effect: Skyrider Sword (Greater)
Effect: Skyrider Sword (Greater).description: You leap upon your sword as it soars through the air. You gain a fly Speed of 25 feet or your land Speed, whichever is slower, but you can't Strike with your weapon except via the weapon's other activation. You can Dismiss the activation, and it ends automatically if you cease holding the weapon with at least one hand.

Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Greater).name: Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Greater)
Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Greater).description: When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 20 feet and a +2 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 10 minutes.

Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Lesser).name: Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Lesser)
Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Lesser).description: When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 15 feet and a +1 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 1 minute.

Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Major).name: Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Major)
Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Major).description: When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 25 feet and a +3 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 1 hour.

Effect: Static Snare.name: Effect: Static Snare
Effect: Static Snare.description: The target takes a -1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against electricity effects for as long as the persistent electricity damage lasts.

Effect: Stonethroat Ammunition (Success).name: Effect: Stonethroat Ammunition (Success)
Effect: Stonethroat Ammunition (Success).description: The ammunition lodges itself loosely into the target's throat. For 1 round, the target takes a -2 status penalty to attack rolls with its jaws or fangs, and to Athletics checks.

Effect: Storm Chair.name: Effect: Storm Chair
Effect: Storm Chair.description: For 1 minute, you gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed, and adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee attack, as well as creatures that touch or hit you with an unarmed attack, take [[/r {2d6}[electricity]]]{2d6 electricity damage} each time. As normal, this applies to creatures who choose to touch you, not when you touch or attack another creature.

Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 1).name: Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 1)
Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 1).description: The creature gains a +2 item bonus to initiative checks.

Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 2).name: Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 2)
Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 2).description: The creature gains a +2 item bonus to initiative checks.

Effect: Suit of Armoire Frustration.name: Effect: Suit of Armoire Frustration
Effect: Suit of Armoire Frustration.description:
On a failure, you and all creatures within 30 feet must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:31] save or be overcome with frustration at how you can't follow the simple, easy-to-understand diagrams for assembling the armoire, imposing a -1 status penalty to Will saves for 1 hour.

Note: This item originates from the 2022 Paizo April Fools Blog post.

Effect: Sulfur Bomb (Failure).name: Effect: Sulfur Bomb (Failure)
Effect: Sulfur Bomb (Failure).description: On a hit (but not a critical hit), the target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

Effect: Taljjae's Mask (The General).name: Effect: Taljjae's Mask (The General)
Effect: Taljjae's Mask (The General).description: The General grants its wearer a +3 status bonus to attack rolls with polearms for 1 minute.

Effect: Taljjae's Mask (The Hero).name: Effect: Taljjae's Mask (The Hero)
Effect: Taljjae's Mask (The Hero).description: The Hero grants its wearer a +3 status bonus to attack rolls with bows for 1 minute.

Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Greater).name: Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Greater)
Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Greater).description:
Granted by activating @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.5Qkz4RVJr2Kx3RL6]{Tanglefoot Bag (Greater)}.

A tanglefoot bag is filled with sticky substances. When you hit a creature with a tanglefoot bag, that creature takes a -15-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute. The Escape DC is 28.

Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser).name: Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser)
Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser).description:
Granted by activating @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.T6Appwwl6nUl56Xj]{Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser)}.

A tanglefoot bag is filled with sticky substances. When you hit a creature with a tanglefoot bag, that creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute. The Escape DC is 17.

Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Major).name: Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Major)
Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Major).description:
Granted by activating @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.BxJNWWvpxacDIsdt]{Tanglefoot Bag (Major)}.

A tanglefoot bag is filled with sticky substances. When you hit a creature with a tanglefoot bag, that creature takes a -20-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute. The Escape DC is 37.

Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate).name: Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate)
Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate).description:
Granted by activating @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.evBPzM1VsuYcoenn]{Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate)}.

A tanglefoot bag is filled with sticky substances. When you hit a creature with a tanglefoot bag, that creature takes a -15-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute. The Escape DC is 19.

Effect: Throne Card.name: Effect: Throne Card
Effect: Throne Card.description: Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.gmg-srd.IJ3nFDu2YcoP6ynd]{Throne} from the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Gyi4IVrAVJRPJF2s]{Deck of Many Things}

Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Failure)
Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Failure).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of disease, but the attempt critically failed. You take a -2 circumstance penalty to your next save against the disease.

Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Success).name: Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Success)
Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Success).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of disease. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your next save against the disease.

Effect: Treat Disease (Success).name: Effect: Treat Disease (Success)
Effect: Treat Disease (Success).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of disease. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next save against the disease.

Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Failure)
Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Failure).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of poison, but the attempt critically failed. You take a -2 circumstance penalty to your next save against the poison.

Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Success).name: Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Success)
Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Success).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of poison. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your next save against the poison.

Effect: Treat Poison (Success).name: Effect: Treat Poison (Success)
Effect: Treat Poison (Success).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of poison. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next save against the poison.

Effect: Tteokguk of Time Advancement.name: Effect: Tteokguk of Time Advancement
Effect: Tteokguk of Time Advancement.description: The creatures gains a +4 status bonus to Deceptions checks to pass as their chosen age, and can add their level to this check as a proficiency bonus if untrained.

Effect: Wand of Fey Flames.name: Effect: Wand of Fey Flames
Effect: Wand of Fey Flames.description: For the duration of the spell, you can use the limning flames as a source for your magic. Creatures affected by your faerie fire must succeed at a Will save against your spell DC or take a -2 status penalty to their Will saves against enchantment and illusions spells as long as they are affected by faerie fire. You can cast an enchantment or illusion spell on such a creature up to a distance twice the spell's normal range. If the spell has a range of touch, or doesn't have a range, it is unaffected by the increase in range from the faerie fire.

Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Greater).name: Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Greater)
Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Greater).description: You gain a +3 item bonus to your attack rolls with this weapon and to Will saves against fear effects.

Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Lesser).name: Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Lesser)
Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Lesser).description: You gain a +1 item bonus to your attack rolls with this weapon and to Will saves against fear effects.

Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Major).name: Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Major)
Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Major).description: You gain ta +4 item bonus to your attack rolls with this weapon and to Will saves against fear effects.

Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Moderate).name: Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Moderate)
Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Moderate).description: You gain a +2 item bonus to your attack rolls with this weapon and to Will saves against fear effects.

Equipment Effect: Chatterer of Follies.name: Equipment Effect: Chatterer of Follies
Equipment Effect: Chatterer of Follies.description: Until the end of your turn, that creature takes a -1 status penalty to Will saves against your enchantment spells and your illusion spells.

Equipment Effect: Emberheart.name: Equipment Effect: Emberheart
Equipment Effect: Emberheart.description: Each ally in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] regains 30 Hit Points and gains a +3 status bonus to Fortitude saves until the end of their next turn.

Equipment Effect: Greater Healer's Gel.name: Equipment Effect: Greater Healer's Gel
Equipment Effect: Greater Healer's Gel.description: Adding this material component to a heal spell bestows an additional 15 temporary Hit Points to one target healed by the spell. These temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

Equipment Effect: Lesser Healer's Gel.name: Equipment Effect: Lesser Healer's Gel
Equipment Effect: Lesser Healer's Gel.description: Adding this material component to a heal spell bestows an additional 5 temporary Hit Points to one target healed by the spell. These temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

Equipment Effect: Moderate Healer's Gel.name: Equipment Effect: Moderate Healer's Gel
Equipment Effect: Moderate Healer's Gel.description: Adding this material component to a heal spell bestows an additional 10 temporary Hit Points to one target healed by the spell. These temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

Equipment Effect: Orchestral Brooch.name: Equipment Effect: Orchestral Brooch
Equipment Effect: Orchestral Brooch.description: You receive a +1 status bonus to your Performance check. If you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.

Equipment Effect: Phoenix Flask.name: Equipment Effect: Phoenix Flask
Equipment Effect: Phoenix Flask.description: For 1 minute, you gain a Fly speed of 40 feet. The first time each round that you Fly (including to hover in place), you shed burning feathers that deal [[/r {3d4}[fire]]]{3d4 fire damage} to all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] at the end of your movement (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true|name:Phoenix Flask Fire Feathers|traits:consumable,evocation,fire,magical,potion|showDC:all] save).

Equipment Effect: Potion of Minute Echoe.name: Equipment Effect: Potion of Minute Echoes
Equipment Effect: Potion of Minute Echoe.description: For 1 minute after drinking this potion, you gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks to hear. In addition, each time you Seek, your hearing becomes a precise sense until the beginning of your next turn, allowing you to pinpoint creatures' locations and otherwise perceive the world in detail by listening to the sound of echoes.

Equipment Effect: Sage's Lash (Turquoise.name: Equipment Effect: Sage's Lash (Turquoise)
Equipment Effect: Sage's Lash (Turquoise.description: Speak “clarity” to grant all affected a +2 status bonus to their next Will save for 1 minute.

Equipment Effect: South Wind's Scorch So.name: Equipment Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Damage)
Equipment Effect: South Wind's Scorch So.description:
While you have a status bonus to at least one of your Speeds, your Strikes with this scimitar that deal fire damage gain a +2 status bonus to their fire damage. The status bonus increases to +3 if the weapon has a greater striking rune and +4 for major striking.

Note: The damage cannot currently be made to automatically increase as the damage dice increase.

Equipment Effect: South Wind's Scorch So.name: Equipment Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Speed Boost)
Equipment Effect: South Wind's Scorch So.description:
You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed until the end of your next turn.

While you have a status bonus to at least one of your Speeds, your Strikes with this scimitar that deal fire damage gain a +2 status bonus to their fire damage. The status bonus increases to +3 if the weapon has a greater striking rune and +4 for major striking.

Note: the base +2 increase to damage is included in this effect. It cannot currently be made to automatically increase.

Equipment Effect: Topology Protoplasm.name: Equipment Effect: Topology Protoplasm
Equipment Effect: Topology Protoplasm.description: In this state, a creature that attempts a check to Squeeze uses the outcome one degree of success better than it rolls and can move its full Speed while Squeezing
